Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • backEnd.Element
      • backEnd.Box
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IceBox

    public class Box
extends Element
    Author:
    matias

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Box(int rowPos, int colPos, Board board)
      The box knows its position( row and column).Also, It keeps a reference of the board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void inWater()
      Deletes this box from the set calls 'boxes' and adds it on set 'boxesInWater'.
      void move(AbstractCell cell, Movement mov)
      Checks if the next cell has an element. if so, the box cannot be moved.
      void moveTo(Movement mov)
      Changes the position of the box.

      • move

        public void move(AbstractCell cell,
        Movement mov)
        Checks if the next cell has an element. if so, the box cannot be moved. Otherwise, its position changes.
        Specified by:
        move in class Element
        Parameters:
        cell - cell where the box is going to be moved or not
        mov - direction of the movement
